body_html:
I run into the same problem. I use Mac OS X in Japanese.

export LC_ALL=en_us.UTF-8
export LANG=en_us.UTF-8

Solved it :)

But I think en_us.UTF-8 should not be assumed by default on installation.
body_text:
I run into the same problem. I use Mac OS X in Japanese.
export LC_ALL=en_us.UTF-8

Solved it :)
But I think en_us.UTF-8 should not be assumed by default on installation.
body:
I run into the same problem. I use Mac OS X in Japanese. 

```
export LC_ALL=en_us.UTF-8
export LANG=en_us.UTF-8
```

Solved it :) 

But I think en_us.UTF-8 should not be assumed by default on installation.
